member.name: T:GSF.EMAX.ControlFile
member.summary: Represents an EMAX control file (i.e., a .CTL file).

member.summary: Creates a new .

member.summary: Creates a new for the specified and attempts to parse.

member.name: M:GSF.EMAX.ControlFile.Parse
member.summary: Parses the .
member.exception: "No EMAX control file name was specified.
EMAX control file was not found.

member.name: P:GSF.EMAX.ControlFile.ConfiguredAnalogChannels
member.summary: Gets configured analog channels.

member.name: P:GSF.EMAX.ControlFile.ConfiguredDigitalChannels
member.summary: Gets the digital channel count for the .

member.name: P:GSF.EMAX.ControlFile.AnalogChannelCount
member.summary: Gets the analog channel count for the .

member.name: P:GSF.EMAX.ControlFile.EventGroupCount
member.summary: Gets the event group count for the .

member.summary: Gets the calculated frame length for the .

member.name: P:GSF.EMAX.ControlFile.ParsedSuccesses
member.summary: Gets instances that were parsed successfully.

member.name: P:GSF.EMAX.ControlFile.ParsedFailures
member.summary: Gets instances that failed to parse.

member.name: T:GSF.EMAX.Parser
member.summary: EMAX data file(s) parser.

member.name: M:GSF.EMAX.Parser.Finalize
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources before the object is reclaimed by .

member.name: M:GSF.EMAX.Parser.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all the resources used by the object.

member.name: M:GSF.EMAX.Parser.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:GSF.EMAX.Parser.OpenFiles
member.summary: Opens all EMAX data file streams.

member.name: M:GSF.EMAX.Parser.CloseFiles
member.summary: Closes all EMAX data file streams.

member.name: M:GSF.EMAX.Parser.ReadNext
member.summary: Reads next EMAX record.
member.returns: true if read succeeded; otherwise false if end of data set was reached.

member.name: P:GSF.EMAX.Parser.ControlFile
member.summary: Gets or sets associated EMAX control file for this .
member.remarks: This is similar in function to a COMTRADE schema file.

member.name: P:GSF.EMAX.Parser.FileName
member.summary: Gets or sets EMAX data filename.
member.remarks: If there are more than one data files in a set (e.g., RCL/RCU), this should be set to first file name in the set, e.g., DATA123.RCL.

member.name: P:GSF.EMAX.Parser.Timestamp
member.summary: Gets timestamp of current record in the timezone of provided IRIG signal.

member.name: P:GSF.EMAX.Parser.TimestampAsUtc
member.summary: Attempts to get current timestamp converted to UTC.
member.remarks: This will only be accurate if timezone configured in device matches IRIG clock.

member.name: P:GSF.EMAX.Parser.Values
member.summary: Gets values of current record.

member.name: P:GSF.EMAX.Parser.EventGroups
member.summary: Gets event groups for current record.

member.name: T:GSF.EMAX.CorrectiveParser
member.summary: EMAX data file(s) parser that calculates timestamps based on sample rate and attempts to correct inverted values.

member.name: M:GSF.EMAX.CorrectiveParser.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:GSF.EMAX.CorrectiveParser.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all the resources used by the object.

member.name: M:GSF.EMAX.CorrectiveParser.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:GSF.EMAX.CorrectiveParser.OpenFiles
member.summary: Opens all EMAX data file streams.

member.name: M:GSF.EMAX.CorrectiveParser.CloseFiles
member.summary: Closes all EMAX data file streams.

member.name: M:GSF.EMAX.CorrectiveParser.ReadNext
member.summary: Reads next EMAX record.
member.returns: true if read succeeded; otherwise false if end of data set was reached.

member.name: P:GSF.EMAX.CorrectiveParser.ControlFile
member.summary: Gets or sets associated EMAX control file for this .
member.remarks: This is similar in function to a COMTRADE schema file.

member.name: P:GSF.EMAX.CorrectiveParser.FileName
member.summary: Gets or sets EMAX data filename.
member.remarks: If there are more than one data files in a set (e.g., RCL/RCU), this should be set to first file name in the set, e.g., DATA123.RCL.

member.name: P:GSF.EMAX.CorrectiveParser.ParsedTimestamp
member.summary: Gets timestamp of current record, parsed from the file, in the timezone of provided IRIG signal.

member.name: P:GSF.EMAX.CorrectiveParser.ParsedTimestampAsUtc
member.summary: Attempts to get current timestamp, parsed from the file, converted to UTC.
member.remarks: This will only be accurate if timezone configured in device matches IRIG clock.

member.name: P:GSF.EMAX.CorrectiveParser.CalculatedTimestamp
member.summary: Gets calculated timestamp of current record in the timezone of provided IRIG signal.

member.name: P:GSF.EMAX.CorrectiveParser.CalculatedTimestampAsUtc
member.summary: Attempts to get calculated timestamp of current record converted to UTC.
member.remarks: This will only be accurate if timezone configured in device matches IRIG clock.

member.name: P:GSF.EMAX.CorrectiveParser.Values
member.summary: Gets values of current record.

member.name: P:GSF.EMAX.CorrectiveParser.CorrectedValues
member.summary: Gets corrected values, which may be inverted based on the difference between the calculated timestamp and the parsed timestamp.

member.name: P:GSF.EMAX.CorrectiveParser.EventGroups
member.summary: Gets event groups for current record.
